name: lsx-login
description: The LSX Login extension allows users to log into a dashboard and then see configurable content based on which users can access which content.
author: LightSpeed

scripts.build-mopo: rm -R languages/lsx-login-en_EN.mo && cp languages/lsx-login.pot languages/lsx-login-en_EN.po && wp i18n make-mo languages
scripts.translate-US: cp languages/lsx-login-en_EN.po languages/lsx-login-en_US.po && cp languages/lsx-login-en_EN.mo languages/lsx-login-en_US.mo
